requirements.description: Form has an 'x' button to close with hover text 'Close'
Form retains details when closed and session is ongoing
First name field exists and is required
Last name field exists and is required
Company name field exists and is required
Region field exists, is required, and is a searchable dropdown
Email field exists, is required, and validates email format
Phone number field exists, is optional, and validates mobile number format
Form includes 'Interested in' list with solution names
Cancel button closes form and retains details during session
Send button is deactivated by default and activates when required fields are filled
Form data is not saved out of session

test_cases.requirement_desc: Form has a heading 'Enquiry'

steps.action: Open the Enquiry form

test_cases.requirement_desc: Form has an 'x' button to close with hover text 'Close'

steps.action: Hover over the 'x' button
Click the 'x' button

test_cases.requirement_desc: Form retains details when closed and session is ongoing
test_cases.title: REQ-003 Positive: Form retains details when closed and reopened in session

steps.action: Fill in the form details
Close the form
Reopen the form in the same session

test_cases.requirement_desc: Form retains details when closed and session is ongoing
test_cases.title: REQ-003 Negative: Form loses details when closed and reopened in session

steps.action: Fill in the form details
Close the form
Reopen the form in the same session
steps.expected: Form does not retain previously entered details

test_cases.requirement_desc: Form retains details when closed and session is ongoing
test_cases.title: REQ-003 Edge Case: Form retains details with special characters when closed and reopened

steps.action: Fill in the form details with special characters
Close the form
Reopen the form in the same session
steps.expected: Form retains previously entered details with special characters

steps.action: Open the Enquiry form
steps.expected: Form displays introduction text 'Please complete the form below, and a Unity expert will be in touch shortly to assist you with your selected solutions.'

test_cases.requirement_desc: Cancel button closes form and retains details during session

Click the Cancel button
steps.expected: Form closes and retains details when reopened in session

test_cases.title: REQ-012 Negative: Cancel button does not retain details

Click the Cancel button
steps.expected: Form closes and does not retain details when reopened in session

Click the Cancel button
steps.expected: Form closes and retains details with special characters when reopened in session
